description: Implementation of Graph Vector Store using Astra DB

token.info: Authentication token for accessing Astra DB.

api_endpoint.info: API endpoint URL for the Astra DB service.

collection_name.info: The name of the collection within Astra DB where the vectors will be stored.

metadata_incoming_links_key.info: Metadata key used for incoming links.

keyspace.info: Optional keyspace within Astra DB to use for the collection.

metric.info: Optional distance metric for vector comparisons in the vector store.

batch_size.info: Optional number of data to process in a single batch.

bulk_insert_batch_concurrency.info: Optional concurrency level for bulk insert operations.

bulk_insert_overwrite_concurrency.info: Optional concurrency level for bulk insert operations that overwrite existing data.

bulk_delete_concurrency.info: Optional concurrency level for bulk delete operations.

setup_mode.info: Configuration mode for setting up the vector store, with options like 'Sync', or 'Off'.

pre_delete_collection.info: Boolean flag to determine whether to delete the collection before creating a new one.

metadata_indexing_include.info: Optional list of metadata fields to include in the indexing.

metadata_indexing_exclude.info: Optional list of metadata fields to exclude from the indexing.

collection_indexing_policy.info: Optional JSON string for the 'indexing' field of the collection. See https://docs.datastax.com/en/astra-db-serverless/api-reference/collections.html#the-indexing-option

search_score_threshold.info: Minimum similarity score threshold for search results. (when using 'Similarity with score threshold')

search_filter.info: Optional dictionary of filters to apply to the search query.

errors.langchain_import_failed: Could not import langchain Astra DB integration package. Please install it with `pip install langchain-astradb`.
errors.invalid_input_type: Vector Store Inputs must be Data objects.

logs.langchain_import_successful: Langchain Astra DB package imported successfully
logs.environment_parse_warning: Warning: Could not import parse_api_endpoint, using None for environment
logs.adding_documents: Adding {count} documents to the Vector Store
logs.no_documents: No documents to add to the Vector Store
logs.no_search_input: No search input provided. Skipping search.
